mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE article.title LIKE CONCAT(#{start},'%');
SELECT * FROM article WHERE article.author LIKE CONCAT(#{name}, '%');
SELECT * FROM article WHERE article.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%');
mapper.insert: INSERT into article (title, author, date, password, content); values (#{title}, #{author}, #{date}, #{password}, #{content});
